snippet: MOST--Barbara, age 93, passed away on February 24, 2016 surrounded by her family. Predeceased by her husband Robert, her parents, sister Geraldine, brothers Joseph and Murray. Survived by loving sons Michael and Larry, daughter-in-law Jodi, and grandchildren Danielle and Evan, along with many adored nieces and nephews. Barbara's memory will always be a blessing to all who knew her. Funeral will be Sunday, February 28, 10:45am at Robert Schoem's Memorial Chapel, Paramus, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MOST--Barbara, age 93, passed away on February 24, 2016 surrounded by her family. Predeceased by her husband Robert, her parents, sister Geraldine, brothers Joseph and Murray.
